message: Let's start fair. I'll take most of the money, but you get a good chunk to start with.
My turn. How about we go 60/40? It's a decent split.
Let's find a compromise. I'll give you a little more than last round, but I still need a larger share to make this worthwhile for me.
This is getting us nowhere.  I'm taking a hit from inflation, so I need a better deal. 45/55 seems fair.
I'm willing to compromise further. This is my final offer before the inflation really starts to hurt us both.
This is my final offer. A 50/50 split is the only fair option considering the inflation. Take it or leave it.
